configuration._instruction: Add the configuration information for this validation test version (e.g., arguments to the SciUnit class).

developer._instruction: Add all parties that developed this validation test version. Note that these developers will overwrite the developer list provided for the overarching validation test.

digitalIdentifier._instruction: Add the globally unique and persistent digital identifier of this research product version.

entryPoint._instruction: Add the entry point for this validation test version (e.g., the Python class name for a SciUnit test).

format._instruction: Add the content type of this validation test version, or the content types of the files composing the validation test version.

isAlternativeVersionOf._instruction: Add all validation test versions that can be used alternatively to this validation test version.

isNewVersionOf._instruction: Add the validation test version preceding this validation test version.

license._instruction: Add the license of this validation test version.

referenceData._instruction: Add the data that define the expected output of this validation test version.
